metadata.title: CVE-2023-51890 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An infinite loop issue discovered in Mathtex 1.05 and before allows aremote attackers to consume CPU resources via crafted string in theapplication URL.

criterions.comment: mathtex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
